articles.author: Yuras Karmanau, Jim Heintz, Vladimir Isachenkov and Dasha Litvinova
articles.title: Russia-Ukraine: Both sides ready to talk amid Russian assault - CTV News
articles.description: Russia renewed its assault Wednesday on Ukraine’s second-largest city in a pounding that lit up the skyline with balls of fire over populated areas, even as both sides said they were ready to resume talks aimed at stopping the new devastating war in Europe.
articles.content:

articles.title: Russia’s biggest lender Sberbank exits Europe - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: State-controlled bank announces it is pulling out of European markets amid tightening of Western sanctions.
articles.content:
Russias largest lender Sberbank says it is pulling out of Europe after coming under pressure from tough sanctions announced by Western countries in response to Moscows invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: European Southern Observatory researchers find 'vampire' star sucking outer layers of companion star - ABC News
articles.description: Astronomers have had a good look at what happens when a "vampire" star sucks the outer layers of material from a companion star, stripping its "bitten" victim down to a mere stellar core.
articles.content:

articles.title: European subsidiary of Russia's Sberbank to enter bankruptcy - CNA
articles.description:
FRANKFURT: The European subsidiary of Russia's Sberbank will be wound up after coming under pressure from Western sanctions levelled against the bank in response to Moscow's invasion of Ukraine, European banking regulators said Tuesday (Mar 1).
